definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: It is distributed both through subscription and retail outlets.
sentences.chinese: 《新京報》自辦發行，以徵訂和零售爲主要發行渠道。

sentences.english: With The Beijing News for represent, the editorial page also appears of visible res.
sentences.chinese: 以《新京報》爲代表，社論版也開始出現。
